name: Time Thief Wonder
text: You can detach 1 Xyz material from a Dark Xyz monster you control; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. If this card is sent to the GY while attached to an Xyz monster as Xyz material: You can send 1 "Time Thief" card from your Deck to your GY. You can only use each effect of "Time Thief Wonder" once per turn.
